actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

official_title: A bill to suspend for a three-year period the duty on N-Amidino -3,5-diamino -6- chloropyrazinecarboxamide monohydrochloride dihydrate, also known as amiloride hydrochloride.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, for a three-year period, the duty on N-amidino -3,5 - diamino -6-chloropyrazine-carboxamide monohydrochloride dihydrate (also known as amiloride hydrochloride).

titles.title: A bill to suspend for a three-year period the duty on N-Amidino -3,5-diamino -6- chloropyrazinecarboxamide monohydrochloride dihydrate, also known as amiloride hydrochloride.
